allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add CI/CD pipeline, E2E navigation tests, and fix pre-existing test failures

- Create GitHub Actions CI workflow with lint, typecheck, unit test, E2E, and build jobs
- Add navigation E2E tests covering landing page, login page, and auth redirects
- Fix .gitignore to allow .github/ directory \(was blocked by .github* pattern\)
- Add test:ci and test:e2e:ci scripts for CI-optimized test runs
- Fix voice-agent-api tests: set required env vars \(OPENAI_API_KEY, ELEVENLABS_API_KEY\)
- Fix voice-agent tests: use node environment to avoid OpenAI browser check in jsdom
- Fix matching tests: mock @/lib/environment and @/lib/ai/embeddings, fix chained .eq\(\) mocks

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add withAuth middleware and refactor match API routes

Phase 2: Extract auth boilerplate into reusable withAuth HOF.

- Create src/lib/api/with-auth.ts wrapping route handlers with auth check
- Refactor all 6 match API routes to use withAuth:
  - GET /api/matches/[id]
  - PATCH /api/matches/[id]/apply
  - PATCH /api/matches/[id]/accept
  - PATCH /api/matches/[id]/decline
  - GET /api/matches/for-me
  - GET /api/matches/for-project/[id]
- Replace inline auth checks and try/catch with middleware
- Use apiError helper for consistent error responses
- Add 6 unit tests for withAuth middleware

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
